### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE fashion_companies (
  company_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  company_name VARCHAR(50),
  company_location VARCHAR(100),
  PRIMARY KEY (company_id)
);

CREATE TABLE media_assets (
  asset_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  asset_name VARCHAR(50),
  asset_type VARCHAR(50),
  asset_url VARCHAR(200),
  company_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (company_id) REFERENCES fashion_companies(company_id)
);

CREATE TABLE image_categories (
  category_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  category_name VARCHAR(50),
  category_description VARCHAR(200)
);

CREATE TABLE asset_categories (
  asset_id INT,
  category_id INT,
  PRIMARY KEY (asset_id, category_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (asset_id) REFERENCES media_assets(asset_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES image_categories(category_id)
);

);
